rooms.description: First car garage space, designed to be wheelchair accessible with ample turning radius.
Second car garage space, designed to be wheelchair accessible with ample turning radius.
spacious living area with large windows for natural lighting and ventilation, following Vastu principles ensuring north-east corner alignment.
Dining area integrated with the living room for an open floor plan, ensuring clear sightlines and natural ventilation.
Modern industrial kitchen with stainless steel finishes. Designed to incorporate wheelchair accessibility features such as lower countertops and open storage.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in wardrobe. Placed in the south-west corner for Vastu alignment, ensuring privacy and natural light.
Guest bedroom with adjoining bathroom for convenience. Located in the north-west area to maintain balance according to Vastu.
Bathroom attached to the guest bedroom. Includes wheelchair accessible fixtures such as grab bars and lower sinks.
Multi-use industrial lounge that can serve as a work area or additional recreational space. Designed with Vastu guidelines for positive energy.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible front entrance with automatic door system, placed in the center of the facade to align with Vastu principles.
Accessible backdoor leading to a private garden area, designed for ease of mobility and natural ventilation.

rooms.description: Penthouse bedroom with expansive windows for natural light and a view, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles in the south-east.
Secondary bedroom with ample storage and privacy. Positioned to maintain balance according to Vastu guidelines.
En suite bathroom for bedroom_1, designed with accessibility features including grab bars and wheelchair space.
Study area integrated into the penthouse layout, optimized for natural light and concentration, following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large panoramic window designed to maximize natural light and provide scenic views.
Accessible ramp leading to the rooftop for relaxation and ventilation, ensuring compliance with wheelchair accessibility norms.
